SEARCH
Module SimpleHttpServer
Package dev.katsute.simplehttpserver

Interface SimpleHttpHandler

All Superinterfaces:
HttpHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileHandler, PredicateHandler, RootHandler, SSEHandler, ThrottledHandler, TimeoutHandler
public interface SimpleHttpHandler extends HttpHandler
A http handler that uses a SimpleHttpExchange. All handlers in this library can be used with a standard HttpServer.
Note: Http handlers will not throw an exception in the main thread, you must use a try-catch to expose them.
Note: An exchange must be sent or closed, otherwise the connection may resend the request until it gets response or times out.
Since:
5.0.0
Version:
5.0.0
Author:
Katsute

  • Method Details

    • handle

      @Deprecated default void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      use handle(SimpleHttpExchange)
      Do not override this method, it will cause handle(SimpleHttpExchange) to not work. Use handle(SimpleHttpExchange) instead.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface HttpHandler
      Parameters:
      exchange - the exchange containing the request from the client and used to send the response
      Throws:
      IOException - IO exception
      See Also:
      • handle(SimpleHttpExchange)

    • handle

      void handle(SimpleHttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles an exchange.
      Http handlers will not throw an exception in the main thread, you must use a try-catch to expose them. All requests must be closed with HttpExchange.close(), otherwise the handler will rerun the request multiple times.
      Parameters:
      exchange - http exchange
      Throws:
      IOException - IO exception
      Since:
      5.0.0
      See Also:
      • SimpleHttpExchange
